books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: An insightful guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir of a woman who grows up in a strict, abusive household and eventually escapes to learn and thrive.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: A novel exploring the choices that shape a life through the lens of a magical library.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: A thrilling science fiction tale of survival, discovery, and an unlikely friendship.

books.title: A Man Called Ove
books.author: Fredrik Backman
books.description: A touching story about love, loss, and the unexpected friendships that can change lives.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A mystery novel set in the marshes of North Carolina, exploring themes of loneliness and resilience.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A psychological thriller about a woman's shocking act of violence and a therapist determined to uncover her motive.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A retelling of the Greek myth of Circe, exploring her transformation from nymph to powerful witch.

books.title: It Ends with Us
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.description: A heart-wrenching romance novel exploring difficult choices and the power of love.

books.title: The Four Agreements
books.author: Don Miguel Ruiz
books.description: A guide to personal freedom and achieving a fulfilling life through four simple agreements.

books.title: The Song of Achilles
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.description: A breathtaking retelling of the Trojan War and the love between Achilles and Patroclus.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A timeless tale of adventure and self-discovery following a shepherd's journey.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A science fiction masterpiece about power, politics, and the desert planet Arrakis.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A chilling vision of a dystopian future ruled by surveillance and totalitarianism.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.author: Mark Manson
books.description: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life by focusing on what truly matters.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A beloved classic about love, class, and society in 19th-century England.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful novel about race and justice in the American South.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A story of wealth, love, and ambition in the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: An exploration of the history and future of humanity.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The inspiring memoir of the former First Lady of the United States.

books.title: Into Thin Air
books.author: Jon Krakauer
books.description: A personal account of the Mount Everest disaster of 1996.

books.title: In Cold Blood
books.author: Truman Capote
books.description: A true-crime novel detailing the murder of the Clutter family in Kansas.
